Name: Mind Spheres
About the game: Inspired by two not so different worlds, Mind Spheres brings you an exclusive and awesome experience. A physics puzzle with minigolf + pinball unique mashup. Figure out puzzles in order to proceed to the next level. Interactive objects and physics simulations; 50 different maps, difficulty increases every level; Smooth piano music, relaxing sound design and visuals.
